modName: FFFVE - Fix For Female Vampire Eyes
summary: A simple mod that fixes the "hazel brown eyes as a vampire" -bug caused by other mods. ~Dawnguard glowing eye support!~
descriptionHtml:
Introduction
----------
So first of all you probably are thinking "Oh look it's one of those vampire eye fixes again. We didn't have enough of those already!" That's okay, because I'd be thinking the same thing, but just hear me out for a moment before clicking that "Go back" -button on your browser.

I was browsing the Internet for a mod that would fix the stupid eye bug for quite a bit of time, and the only ones I found didn't have the Dawnguard's eyes for both males and females, so the eyes on a female would look exactly the same as a male's. That's when I decided to try out my modding skills by making my very first mod, "FFFVE"! (Quite a name for a simple bug fix, isn't it? ;) )

About the mod
----------
This fix addresses an issue that causes a female vampire character's eyes to display the color "hazel brown" instead of the vampiric red. Usually the bug does not happen within the vanilla game, but most mods that add customizable colors for hair and such (i.e. "DartHairColors" by Dart98Rock) seem to cause it.

The mod should be compatible with anything, since it just changes a few HeadPart values. Remember to read the 'NOTE' under 'Installation'!

Installation
----------
Option A: Use the Nexus Mod Manager (recommended)

Option B: Select the proper download - depending on whether you have Dawnguard installed or not - and extract the .rar file into your Skyrim\Data folder.


*NOTE* Make sure (I'm going to use a hair color mod as an example) you CHOOSE YOUR HAIR COLOR BEFORE you install the mod. Whenever you want to
    change the color, disable this fix first and re-enable it when done! The colors wont show up otherwise.

*WARNING* Make sure you have this fix AFTER your hair color / other color mods in the load order! Will not work otherwise! Also if you don't have    Dawnguard installed and select it from the autoinstaller / download the wrong version, your game WILL crash on startup!


Author: TheS0m3b0dy

Enjoy!
author: TheS0m3b0dy
